title: Stacked Against Us
description: What would you do if a ghost from your past suddenly reappeared?I am a no-nonsense type person, yet I start questioning everything.I know I can’t run. There’s nowhere to hide and fate is not on my side.Or is it?When forced to join forces with unusual sources, feelings start to stir that I haven’t felt in a very long time…if ever. All I know is I want Kimberly by myside for all times, but with the nature of my unconventional business venture, and my past haunting us…The odds are not in our favor.Can love find a way to prevail with all that is stacked against us?If you love page turning, action packed stories with all the real feels, then Trent and Kimberly’s story is a must read!
author: Alandra Knight
